Key Match Events: Edwin Uceta allowed a 4-run lead to slip away in the 8th inning
Bryce Harper doubled and was hit by a pitch by Edwin Uceta
The benches cleared after Bryce Harper was hit by a pitch
Post-Match Reflections: The Phillies hold an 8.0-game lead over the New York Mets in the NL East
The Phillies believe they have the right talent and clubhouse to do something special in 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: Edwin Uceta received a three-game suspension from Major League Baseball for intentionally hitting Nick Castellanos
Manager Kevin Cash also received a one-game suspension
Others: The Phillies won the next game Wednesday night to sweep the Rays out of Philadelphia
Nick Castellanos got his revenge in his first at-bat, hitting a two-run home run in the first inning after being hit by the pitch the night before
